product_name: WTB Pure V Race Saddle - Men's
long_description: The WTB Pure V Race mountain bike saddle features a distinctive drop nose design, wide whale-tail pedaling platform and a contoured, ergonomic shape. Flex-Tuned shell boasts an exceptional mix of comfortable flex and firm efficiency; it provides the happy medium that is ideal for most enthusiasts. Love Channel central depression protects your body from unwanted pressure; it provides soft-tissue relief without sacrificing the structural integrity of the saddle. Comfort Zone is a small cutout from the base of the saddle that provides additional relief from pressure on sensitive areas. Traditional WTB drop nose encourages seated climbs and aggressive descending. Wide, padded platform of the WTB Pure V Race saddle is just plain comfortable.
short_description: The WTB Pure V Race mountain bike saddle features a distinctive drop nose design, wide whale-tail pedaling platform and a contoured, ergonomic shape.
